name: quora_scrape_topic
description: Scrape a Quora topic page. Returns topic name, description, follower count, and top questions within the topic.

steps.code: const titleEl = document.querySelector('[class*="topic-name"], h1, [class*="TopicName"]'); const descEl = document.querySelector('[class*="topic-description"], [class*="description"]'); const followersEl = document.querySelector('[class*="followers"], [class*="FollowerCount"]'); const questions = []; document.querySelectorAll('[class*="question"], [class*="Question"]').forEach(function(el) { const qEl = el.querySelector('a span, [class*="text"]'); const answersEl = el.querySelector('[class*="answer-count"]'); if (qEl) { questions.push({ question: qEl.textContent.trim(), answers: answersEl ? answersEl.textContent.trim() : '', url: el.querySelector('a') ? el.querySelector('a').href : '' }); } }); return { topic: '{{topic}}', name: titleEl ? titleEl.textContent.trim() : '', description: descEl ? descEl.textContent.trim().substring(0, 500) : '', followers: followersEl ? followersEl.textContent.trim() : '', question_count: questions.length, questions: questions.slice(0, 20), url: window.location.href }
steps.name: topic_data
steps.label: Extract topic content
